name: Benn Jordan
description: '''Benn Lee Jordan''' (born October 28, 1979) is an American musician operating under pseudonyms. Since 1999, his music has been released under the names of the Flashbulb, Acidwolf, Human Action Network, and FlexE. As of 2024 he runs a [[YouTube]] channel, covering acoustic science and other musical topics with nearly 700,000 subscribers.
